content: I can open an issue/discussion for adding the appropriate labels, but would y'all be down to invite people to contribute to pythia repos as part of hacktoberfest 2021?
Alright I already registered as a maintainer, but if y'all do the same you can count PR reviews, etc. towards getting some swag out of it!
What are the dates of that again?
I think it's just the entire month of October, but I'll double check
Double checked! You can sign up anytime throughout that period as well
I signed up with my personal account!!
